name: Sulforaphane (Broccoli Extract)

dosage.notes: Glucoraphanin + myrosinase = sulforaphane. Or eat broccoli sprouts (50-100x more than mature broccoli).

keyFindings: Most potent natural Nrf2 activator — upregulates hundreds of protective genes
Reduced cancer risk markers in human trials
Improved autistic behavior scores in clinical trial
description: Most potent natural Nrf2 activator — upregulates hundreds of protective genes
